quote: Hate is strewn like confetti by the fear-fueled, specious, tiny- dicked (or un-tender) vacuous dictators, of any gender, whom never knew true love, only sadism. They ALL need some good pharma.
quote_letters: HATE IS STREWN LIKE CONFETTI BY THE FEAR-FUELED SPECIOUS TINY- DICKED OR UN-TENDER VACUOUS DICTATORS OF ANY GENDER WHOM NEVER KNEW TRUE LOVE ONLY SADISM THEY ALL NEED SOME GOOD PHARMA
